QuestData.Title: Tal the Wind Rider Master
QuestData.Description: I have prepared leather goods for Varg to sell at the Bloodhoof Village. Will you bring them to him?$B$BIf you have already been to Bloodhoof Village and spoken to their wind rider master, then you can fly one of our Thunder Bluff wind riders back to him.$B$BTake the leather goods to Tal, our wind rider master in Thunder Bluff, and speak with him to arrange transport to Bloodhoof Village.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Ahanu's Leather Goods to Tal in Thunder Bluff.
QuestData.CompletionText: Greetings, $c. What can I do for you?
QuestData.RewardText: You need to take this to Bloodhoof Village, eh? That's not a problem. If you've already been there and spoken to Tak, then you can take one of my wind riders back to him.
